kit.leader_skill: "Saiyan Saga" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%

super_attack.name: Fierce Roundhouse Crane Attack
super_attack.effect: Causes colossal damage to enemy; Lowers ATK

ultra_super_attack.name: Tri-Beam
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; while sacrificing 5% HP

passive_skill.name: Fight of Sheer Mettle
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 103000 up; For 10 turn(s) from the character's entry turn: Ki +3; When there is an Extreme Class enemy: (Once) Ki +3 for 10 turn(s); For every attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 10300 up (up to 103000); When HP is 80% or more: Launches an additional Super Attack; When HP is 50% or more: Launches an additional attack; When attacking with 18 or more Ki: Medium chance of performing a critical hit; Great chance of performing a critical hit when HP is 50% or less; When HP is 30% or less: Ki +10

lines.context: For 10 turn(s) from the character's entry turn
When there is an Extreme Class enemy

When HP is 50% or more

lines.text: Medium chance of performing a critical hit
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: Great chance of performing a critical hit when HP is 50% or less
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki
When HP is 30% or less

active_skill.name: Farewell, Tien
active_skill.effect: Causes ultimate damage to enemy; Ki +10; DEF +30% for 1 turn
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when HP is 50% or less starting from the 4th turn from the start of battle (once only)
